text: Ladies at Play is a lostThe Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:Ladies at Play Ladies at Play at Arne Andersen's Lost Film Files:lost First National films - 1927 1926 American silent comedy film directed by Alfred E. Green and starring Doris Kenyon, Lloyd Hughes and Louise Fazenda.Monaco p.196 It was remade as a sound film Loose Ankles in 1930.The AFI Catalog of Feature Films 1893-1993:Ladies at Play ==Cast== * Doris Kenyon as Ann Harper * Lloyd Hughes as Gil Barry * Louise Fazenda as Aunt Katherine * Ethel Wales as Aunt Sarah * Hallam Cooley as Terry * John Patrick as Andy * Virginia Lee Corbin as Dotty * Philo McCullough as Hotel Clerk * Tom Ricketts as Deacon Ezra Boody ==References== ==Bibliography== * Monaco, James. The Encyclopedia of Film. title: Ladies at Play
